	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-has-children wp-megamenu-item-2440 wpmm-submenu-right" id="wp-megamenu-item-2440"><a href="#">National Agencies</a>
	<ul class="wp-megamenu-sub-menu">
		<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom wp-megamenu-item-2502 wpmm-submenu-right" id="wp-megamenu-item-2502"><a href="https://www.rbi.org.in/">Reserve Bank Of India</a></li>

		<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom wp-megamenu-item-2505 wpmm-submenu-right" id="wp-megamenu-item-2505"><a href="http://www.licindia.in/">Life Insurance Corporation of India</a></li>

	</ul>
</li>
	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-has-children wp-megamenu-item-2441 wpmm-submenu-right" id="wp-megamenu-item-2441"><a href="#">RRBs sponsored by Indian Bank</a>

						<div class="contentDetail">
							<ul>
								<li><span>ZONAL OFFICE : TIRUPATI</span><h2>TENDER for Supply and Installation of CASH SAFE and STRONG ROOM MAIN DOOR In NEW MICROSATE PALAMANER BRANCH Under TIRUPATI Zone</h2><p><a href="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/TENDERFor-Supply-And-Installation-Of-CASH-SAFE-and-STRONG-ROOM-MAIN-DOOR-In-NEW-MICROSATE-PALAMANER-BRANCH-Under-TIRUPATI-Zone-1.pdf" target="_blank">TENDERFor Supply And Installation Of CASH SAFE and STRONG ROOM MAIN DOOR In NEW MICROSATE PALAMANER BRANCH Under TIRUPATI Zone</a></p><div class="tenderhoverbox"><strong class="fa fa-gavel"></strong><p><span>Last date of submission of Tender<br/><strong>2022-12-05</strong></span></p></div></li><li><span>ZONAL OFFICE : ASANSOL</span><h2>Engagement of alternate premises for Sidhi Branch Distt. Purulia INDIAN BANK ZO ASANSOL LAST DATE 17.12.2022</h2><p><a href="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Engagement-of-alternate-premises-for-Sidhi-Branch-INDIAN-BANK-ZO-ASANSOL-LAST-DATE-17.12.2022.pdf" target="_blank">Engagement of alternate premises for Sidhi Branch Distt. Purulia INDIAN BANK ZO ASANSOL</a></p><div class="tenderhoverbox"><strong class="fa fa-gavel"></strong><p><span>Last date of submission of Tender<br/><strong>2022-12-17</strong></span></p></div></li><li><span>ZONAL OFFICE : GAYA</span><h2>NOTICE INVITING TENDERS FOR LEASING OF OFFICE PREMISES FOR RAJGIR, SOHSARAI AND HILSA BRANCH UNDER ZONAL OFFICE GAYA</h2><p><a href="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Advertisement-English-2.pdf" target="_blank">NOTICE ENGLISH</a></p><p><a href="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Advertisement-Hindi.pdf" target="_blank">NOTICE HINDI</a></p><p><a href="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Technical-Bid-Format-1.pdf" target="_blank">TECHNICAL BID FORMAT</a></p><p><a href="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Financial-Bid-Format-1.pdf" target="_blank">FINANCIAL BID FORMAT</a></p><div class="tenderhoverbox"><strong class="fa fa-gavel"></strong><p><span>Last date of submission of Tender<br/><strong>2022-12-20</strong></span></p></div></li><li><span>ZONAL OFFICE : BARASAT</span><h2>QUOTATION/TENDER INVITED FOR INTERIOR FURNISHING WORKS (COMPOSITE), INVOLVING FURNISHING, CARPENTRY, ELECTRICAL, LAN CABLING &amp; OTHER MISC. WORKS OF GOPALPUR BRANCH- WEST BENGAL(24 PGS NORTH)</h2><p><a href="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Gopalpur-Interior-and-Electrical.pdf" target="_blank">QUOTATION/TENDER INVITED FOR INTERIOR FURNISHING WORKS (COMPOSITE), INVOLVING FURNISHING, CARPENTRY, ELECTRICAL, LAN CABLING &amp; OTHER MISC.
